# File test/ext_ind_test.rb, line 818
  def test_01_square_brackets
    # Changes: results returned in frame 

    
    a = @cls[ 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 ]
    assert_instance_of(@cls, a)
    assert_equal(5, a.length)
    #5.times { |i| assert_equal(5-i, a[i]) }

    5.times { |i| assert_equal([5-i], a[i]) }
    assert_nil(a[6])
  end
